attributes.action: Create areas of the seas around Britain where all commercial fishing is banned for ten years to allow stocks to recover.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The predicted total collapse in the world's fish stocks by 2050 is a major concern for the human race. Canada and Iceland have both banned commercial fishing in large areas of their territorial waters. The result has been a recovery of stocks. Britain must act now to do the same

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Create areas of the seas around Britain where all commercial fishing is banned for ten years to allow stocks to recover."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14148.asp

Prime Minister's Office
